title: 德國聯署搞手被港共恐嚇

replies.msg:
Glacier Kwong:
I was being threatened by someone who claims to be a civil servant of the HKSAR to stop my activism if I still wanna go home. Since @DavidJRMissal and I filed the petition (https://bit.ly/35Z4LDD), I have been receiving more of these texts.
I am fully aware of all possible consequences when I made my call to file a petition urging for formal diplomatic measures to be taken against #China’s human rights violation, including being harassed— verbally or physically, and never being able to return to HK.
It is highly disturbing to be threatened. However, compare to many who suffered from the Asia’s finest HKPF’s physical abuse, torture and sexual harassment, and the #12HKYouth that are detained, I am luckily safe and sound and am in no position to complain.
This threat and all the others I have received and I will receive only illustrates how #CCP intends to crackdown on the movement in HK by means of threats and creating fear. I urge you to take part in the petition or any other acts taken against CCP.

https://twitter.com/KwongGlacier/status/1313056665579786241?s=20


德國政府官方聯署：只要夠數 德國就會喺國會討論制裁中國
https://epetitionen.bundestag.de/petitionen/_2020/_07/_02/Petition_113264.$$$.a.u.html

quote.msg:
Glacier Kwong:
I was being threatened by someone who claims to be a civil servant of the HKSAR to stop my activism if I still wanna go home. Since @DavidJRMissal and I filed the petition (https://bit.ly/35Z4LDD), I have been receiving more of these texts.
I am fully aware of all possible consequences when I made my call to file a petition urging for formal diplomatic measures to be taken against #China’s human rights violation, including being harassed— verbally or physically, and never being able to return to HK.
It is highly disturbing to be threatened. However, compare to many who suffered from the Asia’s finest HKPF’s physical abuse, torture and sexual harassment, and the #12HKYouth that are detained, I am luckily safe and sound and am in no position to complain.
This threat and all the others I have received and I will receive only illustrates how #CCP intends to crackdown on the movement in HK by means of threats and creating fear. I urge you to take part in the petition or any other acts taken against CCP.

https://twitter.com/KwongGlacier/status/1313056665579786241?s=20
